Hiking is a good way to exercise. Do you like it?
Hiking is good for health. Most people choose to go hiking in the countryside, in the forests _ in the mountains. They like to be close to nature and exercise to keep fit at the same time.
If you are a beginner, you should start with a hike that you can finish _ one day. As you get stronger, you can go on overnight   hikes. Later you can go on _ hikes which may last for days or weeks.
For safety reasons, hikers should go hiking with others. You should have one or more friends with you. _ , if you decide to be alone, you'd better let someone know where you are going and when you will return . It is also a good idea to bring a map .
Backpacking is also a kind of _ . You can carry food, clothing and other things on your back in a pack. Backpackers can stay many days in places where there is no food to buy.
